txt.en: The abandoned mines of Sundergrót still hold valuable ore and treasures, ripe for the taking. However, the goblin intruders stand in your way….\n\nYour mission is to find the dwarf-treasure hidden somewhere in Sundergrót.
You have been tasked with finding a great treasure in Sundergrót.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'The abandoned mine, Sundergrót, lies to the south of here, in the Floodfells. We have discovered references in some old records of some kind of hidden treasure inside. What kind of dwarf would I be if I ignored a treasure in waiting? Find it, and bring it back here. It will help fund the war effort!'
Complete Mission: The Riches of Sundergrót
Your mission is to find the dwarf-treasure in Sundergrót.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to Sundergrót,
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!

Hórin's eyes gleam as he looks over the treasure.\n\n'Ah, what a sight! It brings a tear to my eye. I will make sure this wealth is added to our war coffers and put to good use. Thank you, [placeholder].'
You must find a way to breach a barrier to reach your mission objective.
